definition: Yuncheng district of Yunfu city 雲浮市|云浮市[Yun2 fu2 shi4], Guangdong
cloud/CL:朵[duo3]
(classical) to say
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
city walls/city/town/CL:座[zuo4],道[dao4],個|个[ge4]
Yuncheng district of Yunfu city 雲浮市|云浮市[Yun2 fu2 shi4], Guangdong

sentences.english: Hood knew the Empire had spies on Cloud City.
sentences.chinese: 胡德知道云城有帝国间谍。

sentences.english: Their plan worked and the city was eventually liberated by the Alliance.
sentences.chinese: 他们的计划取得了成功，云城最后被义军同盟解放。

sentences.english: The predominant quality and elegant environment make "Chenguang" cate more famous in Yuncheng.
sentences.chinese: 卓越品质，高雅环境令“晨光”美食名扬云城。

sentences.english: Lobot stayed with Cloud City even during the Imperial occupation.
sentences.chinese: 甚至在帝国占领期间，洛博特也没有逃离云城。

sentences.english: On Cloud City, Lobot was caught thieving by the Wing Guard.
sentences.chinese: 在云城，洛博特因为盗窃而被“翼”卫队逮捕。

sentences.english: The end result was one of the most loyal employees Cloud City has ever had.
sentences.chinese: 结果，这造就了云城有史以来最忠诚的雇员之一。

sentences.english: They decided to risk re-contacting Cloud City.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定冒险与云城重新联系。
